attributes.action: Allow Military families about to leave the service the right to apply to any council housing/association.At the present time any military family who are leaving married quarters and cannot afford to buy their own home are not allowed to apply to the local council/housing associations even if children are in local schools. This should also apply to families when a seperation has occured, at the moment all have to apply to the City or town where they were born even if this is hundred of miles away from the base/station/ship that they have served or lived.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Families are being forced to move from areas that they are settled in regardless, this is affecting children's education, of which there is to much already within military life. The wives/husbands choose the lifestyle, the children dont!, but they suffer.
